name: MILD WEST DEMO
description:
This is a demo version of my upcoming game called Mıld West. It is an survival game. If you see anything wrong you are free to add a comment.

CONTROLS OF THE GAME

Walking: You can use W A S D keys to run in vertical or horizontal way.

Running: Press LEFT SHİFT to sprint, but becareful you have stamina!.

Jumping: Press SPACE to jump.

SHORTCUTS:

Shift+1 Moving Dust true/false

Shift+ 2 =Rain System enabled/disabled.

Shift+3 = Day/Night cycle

To kill animal for food: Press left mouse button to shoot bullet.

Open a map: Press M button.

Pause  a game: Press P or ESC to pause and change settings.
